page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Because it is a rural area with no industry,the main occupation is agriculture.Some in Sherborne work for the Sherborne Estate and live in estate cottages.Some people work at a transport cafe called'The Windrush Eater'on the A40 just outside Windrush.There are 12 people who work in the bulding trade as builders, plumbers and carpenters.More people work out of the area than in it.Some travel to Brize Norton and Fairford air base,and some to Northleach and Cheltenham on the works bus.Many of the people of Windrush and Sherborne are retired,and some only live in Windrush at weekends.
